nodes.documentation: @dev VoteCast event is called whenever a vote is cast that can potentially close the proposal.

categorizeProposal(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Categorizes proposal to proceed further. Categories shows the proposal objective.

params._categoryId: This id tells under which the proposal is categorized i.e. Proposal's Objective
params._proposalDescHash: Proposal description hash through IPFS having Short and long description of proposal

createProposalwithSolution(string,string.details: Creates a new proposal with solution and votes for the solution

params._categoryId: This id tells under which the proposal is categorized i.e. Proposal's Objective
params._proposalDescHash: Proposal description hash through IPFS having Short and long description of proposal
params._solutionHash: Solution hash contains  parameters, values and description needed according to proposal
Solution hash contains  parameters, values and description needed according to proposal

params._solutionChosen: solution chosen while voting. _solutionChosen[0] is the chosen solution
